attributes.action: not support overseas tax havens like the Cayman Islands which is a UK overseas independent territory as its a direct threat to the British Tax payer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tax havens are flatforms mainly for the rich and used by criminals to protect thier funds from tax in thier own country.
Tax havens have laws to keep accounts secret and provides the perfect conditions for dirty money to flow.
No matter what laws are past to fight dirty money the system is only as good as the people in place to provide the safeguards pepole that will go to any lengh to protect the tax haven.
Britain is losing out on millions of tax that should be paid but not because of tax havens. In this global village we should all pay our fair share of tax.
